In 2023 I conducted a couple of episodes for the Forecasting Impact podcast with with Mahdi Abolghasemi.     

1. [Prof George Athanasopoulos](https://www.buzzsprout.com/1641538/13044152-george-athanasopoulos-president-of-international-institute-of-forecasters) on multiple topics including IIF's plans and his research on forecasting.

 
2. [Dr Thiyanga and Dilini Talagala](https://www.buzzsprout.com/1641538/13375707-priyanga-dilini-talagala-and-thiyanga-talagala) on their academic journey from Sri Lanka to Australia and back to Sri Lanka again.

3. Dr Eric Siegel on his new book. Stay tuned for this podcast, it will come out in 2024.
